hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa Al-Ash`ari:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Give food to the hungry, pay a visit to the sick and release (set free) the one in captivity (by paying his ransom)

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ وَقَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {كُلُوا مِنْ طَيِّبَاتِ مَا رَزَقْنَاكُمْ}
chapter.eng-name: Eat of the lawful things that We have provided you with..."
